sub_topic: Probability of a certain medical condition occurring
message_1: What is the probability that a person selected at random from a population of 1000 will have a certain medical condition if the prevalence rate of the condition in the population is 5%?
message_2: The probability that a person selected at random from a population of 1000 will have a certain medical condition with a prevalence rate of 5% is simply the prevalence rate itself, which is 5%.
